testsuite.title: OWS Context 1.0 Conformance Test Suite
testsuite.description: This executable test suite (ETS) validates OWS context documents in accord with the OGC OWS Context Atom Encoding Standar (OGC 12-084r2) and related specifications. The test run arguments are summarized in the following table. The obligation descriptor can have the following values: M (mandatory), O (optional), or C (conditional).

testrunargument.name: iut
testrunargument.description: A URI that refers to a representation of an OWS context document. Ampersand ('&') characters must be percent-encoded as '%26'.

testrunargument.name: ics
testrunargument.valuedomain: A comma-separated list of string values.
testrunargument.description: An implementation conformance statement that indicates which conformance classes or options are supported.
